text:
Hi, I'm a Berlin-based Ember dev at PeopleDoc. Building their apps with Ember since 1.8.
And I'm going to EmberCamp as well. Looking forward to seeing you there.
Welcome <@U0CNG49R9>. Looking forward to catching up at EmberCamp.
Which is next week by the way....WOOOP!!!!

hi there people! I finally managed to get access to the channel (thanks to <@U03V5B7KY> ) - I'm Ricardo and my background is more on backend, data mining and search, but got into Ember because we use it in the frontend of our platform at Localistico (<http://localistico.com>) I've previously worked for Google, Yahoo, Microsoft and Vodafone/Telefonica, so happy to help if anybody needs intros or gossip about any of them. Other than that, will try to post a couple of the job openings we have in the jobs channel soon and always happy to debate about the advantages and disadvantages of Elixir vs Go vs Ruby vs anything else (like we did at the pub the other night)

attachments.title: Localistico - We make your business easier to find online
attachments.text: Localistico - We make your business easier to find online.
attachments.fallback: Localistico: Localistico - We make your business easier to find online

text: are you (or any other people from Localistico) going to EmberCamp?

I think we may be missing EmberCamp as I'm booked for some event with the USA Embassy - and Dani, who actually wanted to go, will be in Madrid that week (the problems of being distributed... most of the cool stuff still happens in London :P)

Hi guys and gals! I'm a Berlin-based freelance front-end dev who is also working with Ember and who is checking out your great speaker videos from your meetups every once in a while. I have a strong background in systems biology but have  been working as a front-end person for the last few years - would love to make these two professional ends meet again soon! And of course I'd like to see some of the great Ember stuff that is happening in London live in the near future
G'day <@U0CPGNPRN>. Welcome. Let us know if we can be of any assistance.
